member.name: T:Cethleann.DATA0
member.summary: DATA0 is a list of information for which to read DATA1 with.

member.summary: Uncompressed (read: bytes to expect from decompression) size of this file.

member.summary: Compressed (read: bytes to read in this file) size of this file.

member.name: P:Cethleann.Structure.DATA0Entry.IsCompressed

member.name: P:Cethleann.Structure.DATA1CompressionInfo.Unknown
member.summary: Always 0x10000, I assumed ChunkSize but it doesn't match up.

member.name: P:Cethleann.Structure.DATA1CompressionInfo.Size
member.summary: Compressed (read: bytes to read in this file) size of this file. Don't know why this exist, maybe anonymous file pointers?
